attributes.review: I’m sorry but this app was one of the worst apps I could download I thought it was gonna be easy to navigate and go through the app was extremely slow and had no details for anything I would never recommend this app even if I had to! This app was absolutely horrid!
attributes.title: BAD APP

attributes.review:
Terrible app. Took way to long to download, it won’t function right, reeks of racists & rapist!! App smelled so bad I JUST HAD to give it one star... Its horrible! It gave me hemroids and then when my mom tried to get the app she died!!!!  Dont get this app 😤🤬 
even tho this app is not functional just remember guys, all apps matter!
attributes.title: All apps matter

attributes.review: I went to go see what was on your guys president’s🍊(he ain’t mine) app. So I click on the app and the first thing I see the first thing is a boy version of the girl in Willie Wonka and The Chocolate Factory where she eats a blueberry and you know the story, but Trump must have ate an orange or something. One more thing to add!! Presidents don’t get shot like they used to.
attributes.title: Ben Dover

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see the different type of information I could find out but every time that I open the app it glitches me out of it. I have deleted it and downloaded it multiple times but it still hasn’t fix anything.
attributes.title: App lagging

attributes.review: There are so many wrong things with this app. It’s a low quality app. I came here to find out why I should like trump and I really couldn’t find a reason too. It just doesn’t make any sense. In a overall review you should not download this app it’s a waste of time😹
attributes.title: no just no

attributes.review: I opened the app and my phone immediately got a virus!? Also the app took 5 hours to download. And the things that he says on their are cruel. He talks about making the people who don’t agree with what he does, that they are going to have to pay for what they’ve done.
attributes.title: TrUmP hAs nO iDeA wHaT hE iS dOiNg✊🏿✊🏾

attributes.review: When I got on to the I can seeing Cheetos on my screen I thought it was a glitch but it wasn’t I saw it everywhere it was the most disgusting thing I have ever seen on My phone before And I have seen porn. But I hope this app is gone by the time I wake up tomorrow so I don’t have to life though that trama again
attributes.title: GROSSES APP EVER

attributes.review: I didn’t even know president trump had an app, so when a I found out I was eager to download. Unfortunately, it took almost an hour to download and when I opened it I think that it may have made my phone glitch. Is this really his official app or some kind of virus? Not sure.
attributes.title: Glitch

attributes.review: This app has no general use on my phone, I highly recommend not downloading it. It’s hard to maneuver around and provides no substantial change in your life or on even on your phone, unless you just want to lose some of your storage.
attributes.title: Waste of time
